data.comment: The match has started.
Ball safe as Braga is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 2, Nacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Braga in their own half.
Throw-in Braga.
In the minute 3, Braga's Wenderson Galeno gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Braga.
Throw-in for Braga in the half of Nacional.
In the minute 6, Artur Soares Dias signals a Braga throw-in in Nacional's half.
Can Nacional get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Braga's half?
Free kick for Nacional in the half of Braga.
In the minute 9, Throw-in for Braga at Braga Municipal.
In Braga Nacional attack through Brayan Riascos. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Braga at Braga Municipal.
In the minute 12, In Braga a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Braga to take a throw-in in Nacional territory.
Throw-in for Nacional in their own half.
In the minute 15, Andre Castro (Braga) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in high up the field for Braga in Braga.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 17, Braga drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Artur Soares Dias signals a free kick to Braga in their own half.
Braga to take a throw-in in Nacional territory.
In the minute 19, Ball goes out of play for a Nacional goal kick.
Braga's Ricardo Esgaio is on target but unsuccessful.
Artur Soares Dias signals a free kick to Braga.
In the minute 22, Artur Soares Dias awards the home team a throw-in.
Nacional awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Important block from the Nacional defence as Wenderson Galeno fires in a strike for Braga.
In the minute 25, Braga drive upfield and Iuri Medeiros gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Nacional defender.
Artur Soares Dias signals a free kick to Nacional in their own half.
Throw-in for Braga at Braga Municipal.
In the minute 28, Throw-in Nacional.
Fransergio is on target to give Braga a 1-0 advantage.
Free kick for Braga in their own half.
In the minute 31, Nacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Braga.
Chico Ramos (Nacional) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 34, Nacional's Brayan Riascos is whistled for offside at Braga Municipal.
Nacional awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Nacional have been awarded a corner by Artur Soares Dias.
In the minute 36, Braga awarded a free kick in their own half.
Nacional's Lucas Kal has been booked in Braga.
Fransergio of Braga smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 38, Ball safe as Nacional is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Braga are caught offside.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 40, Braga's Iuri Medeiros gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Nacional defender.
Artur Soares Dias awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Nacional in their own half.
In the minute 42, Free kick for Braga in their own half.
Braga take a comfortable 2-0 lead thanks to Iuri Medeiros.
That's a fine assist from Wenderson Galeno.
In the minute 44, Throw-in for Nacional in their own half.
Artur Soares Dias awards Braga a goal kick.
The 1st half is prolonged by 2 minutes of added time.
In the minute 45, Artur Soares Dias signals a free kick to Braga in their own half.
Ricardo Horta for Braga gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Nacional have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Throw-in Nacional.
In the minute 48, Artur Soares Dias signals a Braga throw-in in Nacional's half.
Throw-in for Braga in the half of Nacional.
In Braga, Brayan Riascos of Nacional is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 49, Braga awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Braga.
Can Braga capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 51, David Carmo (Braga) strikes at Braga Municipal but his header is cleared.
Braga have been awarded a corner by Artur Soares Dias.
Corner awarded to Braga.
In the minute 52, Artur Soares Dias signals a throw-in for Braga, close to Nacional's area.
Braga pushes forward through Paulinho, whose finish on goal is saved.
Free kick Nacional.
In the minute 54, Throw-in for Nacional close to the penalty box.
Can Nacional get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Braga's half?
Artur Soares Dias awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 58, Corner awarded to Braga.
Nacional have been awarded a corner by Artur Soares Dias.
Braga's Wenderson Galeno breaks free at Braga Municipal. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 60, Ball goes out of play for a Nacional goal kick.
Can Braga capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Nacional's half?
Braga's Wenderson Galeno gets in a shot on goal at Braga Municipal. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 62, Free kick for Nacional in the half of Braga.
Nacional have a goal kick.
Free kick for Nacional in their own half.
The away team replace Chico Ramos with Kenji Gorre.
In the minute 64, Luis Freire (Nacional) is making a second substitution, with Larry Azouni replacing Joao Victor.
Artur Soares Dias signals a free kick to Nacional.
In the minute 65, Nacional awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Andre Horta is replacing Iuri Medeiros for the home team.
Ball safe as Nacional is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 68, Artur Soares Dias signals a free kick to Braga in their own half.
Ricardo Esgaio of Braga gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Nacional at Braga Municipal.
In the minute 70, In Braga a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Ruben Freitas (Nacional) has received a first yellow card.
Fransergio (Braga) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 72, Throw-in for Braga at Braga Municipal.
Braga push forward at Braga Municipal and Ricardo Horta gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Nacional defence.
Braga's Fransergio breaks free at Braga Municipal. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 73, It's a goal kick for the away team in Braga.
In Braga a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Braga push upfield but Artur Soares Dias quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 75, Nacional needs to be cautious. Braga have an attacking throw-in.
Artur Soares Dias awards Nacional a goal kick.
Free kick Nacional.
In the minute 76, Nuno Sequeira (Braga) gets a yellow card.
Braga to take a throw-in in Nacional territory.
Braga have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 78, Francisco Moura is replacing Wenderson Galeno for Braga at Braga Municipal.
Can Braga get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nacional's half?
Witi is on a sub for Ruben Micael for Nacional.
In the minute 81, Nacional make their fourth substitution with Abdullahi Ibrahim Alhassan replacing Joao Camacho.
Throw-in for Nacional at Braga Municipal.
The away team have replaced Brayan Riascos with Bryan Rochez. This is the fifth substitution made today by Luis Freire.
In the minute 84, Throw-in for Nacional in their own half.
Nacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
Nuno Borges strikes to reduce the deficit to 2-1 at Braga Municipal.
In the minute 88, Ball safe as Braga is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Artur Soares Dias signals a free kick to Braga.
Throw-in Braga.
In the minute 89, Free kick for Braga in the half of Nacional.
Larry Azouni (Nacional) has received a yellow card from Artur Soares Dias.
Nacional awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Braga in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Nacional needs to be cautious. Braga have an attacking throw-in.
Artur Soares Dias awards Nacional a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Braga in the half of Nacional.
Nacional awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Nacional at Braga Municipal.
Artur Soares Dias signals a Nacional throw-in in Braga's half.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-1.
Abel Ruiz is on a sub for Ricardo Horta for Braga.
